name: oro/api-doc-bundle
description: Fork of nelmio/NelmioApiDocBundle to make 2.x version compatible with Symfony 5

suggest.symfony/form: For using form definitions as input.
suggest.symfony/validator: For making use of validator information in the doc.
suggest.friendsofsymfony/rest-bundle: For making use of REST information in the doc.
suggest.dunglas/api-bundle: For making use of resources definitions of DunglasApiBundle.
suggest.jms/serializer: For making use of serializer information in the doc.
